data.name: Sorry. (Entschuldigung)
data.detailed_description:
WARNING! Entschuldigung is a dark, psychological horror story that contains disturbing themes. For an optimal experience, read this haunting visual novel alone in a dark room.

Entschuldigung (which means ‘sorry’ in German) is a bleak horror story, told by a lost young man who longs to find a place in which he can feel safe. Due to circumstances beyond his control, our protagonist has recently emigrated to Berlin; a town that brims with an undercurrent of anxiety as war rapidly approaches. Alone in an alien land, he diverts his attention to a mysterious, old house, adamant that it hides secrets in its shadows. An insatiable curiosity leads our protagonist down a very dark path into the murky depths of humanity. As he fights to comprehend his reality, he also fights to make sense of himself.

With light sources scarce, you are equipped with an old gas lamp. It's a little unreliable though, so it's bound to play up. If it does, just give it a good shake and it'll be as right as rain! Please note that you have the option to switch the script font to a plain one.

To learn a little about our protagonist in advance of reading the story, be sure to visit the website linked to the right for a chance to read exclusive diary excerpts.

Upcoming Features:

  • Full integration of Steam features (achievements, trading cards etc).
  • Hidden objects that once found, unlock in a gallery and provide further background to various elements of the story.
  • Full translations (German, Chinese, Japanese and Spanish are currently planned).

Set in pre-war Berlin, the story is driven by an insatiable curiosity that leads our protagonist down a very dark path into the unknown.
